form.name: form1

span.p:
Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced that all schools in the State of Ohio will be closed from Monday, March 16 until at least May 1.
District updates during this time can be found HERE.

div.span: Meeting Dates, Minutes, Watch Meetings Online & More
All facilities plan updates can be found here

div.h3: Follow the District on Social Media
div.span: Daily updates on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube
Stay informed with the District Newsletters

span.br: Staff members across the District wanted to share positive messages with students and families while they are away from school. We hope this video brings you and your family comfort during this difficult time.

img.title: Online
img.alt: Online and Distance Learning Instructions * UPDATED APRIL 9

div.h3: Online and Distance Learning Instructions * UPDATED APRIL 9

span.br: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced that the state ordered school closure will now go through at least Friday, May 1. The next phase of Online and Distance Learning will begin on Tuesday, April 14. Click 'Read More' for detailed instructions to guide you through this process.

img.title: Internet
img.alt: Options for Families with No Internet

div.h3: Options for Families with No Internet

span.br: We understand that not all families in the District have access to the internet. This article outlines some options that your family can explore during this extended state-ordered school closure. Please share with any families you know who do not have the internet.

img.title: Logo
img.alt: COVID-19 Running Updates - Schools closed March 16-May 1

div.h3: COVID-19 Running Updates - Schools closed March 16-May 1

span.br:
Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced that the state ordered school closure will now go through at least Friday, May 1.
For running updates about how the Riverside Local School District is operating during the COVID-19 crisis, click 'Read More'

br.span: If you experience any technical issues with your Chromebook device during this Online Instruction period, we have put the following protocols in place to help assist you during this time.

img.title: Meal Logo
img.alt: Meal Services During Closure * Updated April 7

div.h3: Meal Services During Closure * Updated April 7

span.br: Beginning Monday, March 30, the Riverside Local School District will be providing students with breakfast and lunch meals on Mondays and Wednesdays throughout the duration of the state ordered school closure. Meals will be packaged for multiple days.

Given these uncertain times, the District want you to know that the school counselors will be available to answer questions throughout the time that we are away from school. This article also includes coping strategies and tips to reduce stress and anxiety during this crisis.

img.title: Levy Renewal
img.alt: Renewal Levy - Issue 2 - ABSENTEE VOTING EXTENDED THROUGH APRIL 28

div.h3: Renewal Levy - Issue 2 - ABSENTEE VOTING EXTENDED THROUGH APRIL 28

span.br: The 2020 Ohio Primary Election originally scheduled for March 17, 2020 will now be conducted by absentee ballot through April 28. The Riverside Local School District is part of the Lake County School Financing District Renewal Levy (Issue 2) that will appear on the Primary Election ballot. Because this is a renewal levy, there will be NO TAX INCREASE for residents.
